p: The prevalence of bactibilia was 16.36% (9/55), with 10.91% (6/55) of dogs diagnosed on cytology and 10.91% (6/55) on bile culture. There was poor agreement between bile cytology and culture (0.439, Cohens kappa; P = 0.001). No significant differences in liver enzyme concentrations were found between bactibilic and non‐bactibilic dogs. No significant hepatobiliary histopathological abnormalities were present in bactibilic dogs.
